meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Guy Wilson Heather Powell Sarah Fremgen Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6853.

td.p: Guy Wilson, a football coach and tutor from Leesburg, Florida
Heather Powell, a director of compliance investigations from Schwenksville, Pennsylvania
Sarah Fremgen, a microbiologist from Carrollton, Texas (whose 1-day cash winnings total $21,000)

tr.td: WRAPPER'S DELIGHT
(Alex: Interesting spelling there.)
MICHIGAN ODDS & ENDS
WHAT KIND OF ANIMATED ANIMAL ARE YOU?
DIFFERS BY A LETTER
THAT'S ALL IN THE PAST
(Alex: Because...)
I'M A CHANGED MAN!

cigar

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: I remember their first appearance on The Ed Sullivan Show, so I would\'ve been happy to help you guys come up with a correct response here.)
...
(Alex: [To Heather] I don\'t think you needed any [*], because that\'s correct.)
HeatherWhat is Help?
$8,000
GuyWhat is Hey Jude?
$6,200
SarahWhat is Help?
$12,000
\"Help!\"')
